title: Tear Avenger
description: A beautiful Russian girl named Victoria , who's young life was shattered into darkness and despair from the wicked ways of an abusive and psychotic father. Victoria runs away , to Moscow after slaying the dragon (her nickname for her father ) but Human traffickers capture her and a few friends she made along the way to hell and sell the tortured girls to one Armand DeCosta, a monster of a human being.The demons follow poor Vicky into adulthood and all seems hopeless.. Until a friend cannot just stand by and watch the torment and abuse anymore.Taking matters in her own hands ,soon, all those bloody tear drops and broken hearts are avenged....one monster and one dragon at a time .
author: Joshua Heights
